2--null.name: Take your first steps into adventure! Welcome to Maple World.\n<FONT color='#FFD200'>Beginners are people too, man.</FONT>

11--null.name: Protect your allies with a heart of gold and a body of iron! Through hard work and sheer determination, the Knight has become one of Maple World's most stalwart heroes.\n<FONT color='#FFD200'>This hero uses a sword and shield to become a bastion of defense.</FONT>

21--null.name: Harness your rage and unleash destruction on your enemies! An ancient fury burns within the Berserker's heart, turning them into a force of nature on the battlefield.\n<FONT color='#FFD200'>This hero cleaves through their enemies with a greatsword.</FONT>

31--null.name: Bend the power of the elements to your will! The genius Wizard may seem laid back, but there's nothing laid back about their fearsome spells.\n<FONT color='#FFD200'>This hero commands the arcane with a staff.</FONT>

41--null.name: Spread the blessings of the light to the lost and hopeless! The Priest selflessly works to hold back the darkness that threatens Maple World.\n<FONT color='#FFD200'>This hero commands holy power with a scepter and a codex of prayers.</FONT>

51--null.name: Loose your arrow into the heart of evil! A member of the Green Hoods, the Archer works tirelessly to protect Henesysâ€”and all of Maple World.\n<FONT color='#FFD200'>This hero rains arrows on their enemies with a bow.</FONT>

61--null.name: Lay waste to the forces of darkness with superior firepower! An eccentric engineer from Edelstein, the Heavy Gunner seeks to better the world with their inventions.\n<FONT color='#FFD200'>This hero blows enemies away with a cannon.</FONT>

71--null.name: Take what you want and vanish without a trace! The sly Thief uses their wit and wiles to fight for good... as long as proper compensation is involved.\n<FONT color='#FFD200'>This hero slices and dices enemies with two daggers.</FONT>

81--null.name: Strike from the shadows with lethal precision! The Assassin used to be the best in the business but left the criminal underworld to seek new meaning.\n<FONT color='#FFD200'>This hero uses two thrown weapons to disable and defeat enemies at range.</FONT>

91-RuneBlader-null.name: Why choose between blade and spell when you can have both? As a member of the legendary order Terrune Calibre, the Runeblade's training in sword and sorcery makes them a mighty adversary.\n<FONT color='#FFD200'>This hero pairs elemental rune magic with blade techniques to decimate foes.</FONT>

101-Striker-null.name: As a master of the bare-fisted martial arts, the Striker uses a combination of brutal kicks and punches to defend the downtrodden and defenseless of Kerning City.\n<FONT color='#FFD200'>This hero uses knuckle weapons to deliver an endless barrage of strikes.</FONT>

111-SoulBinder-null.name: Channel nature itself to crush your foes! As the newest disciple of Guidance, the mysterious Soul Binder wields animus to project powerful attacks.\n<FONT color='#FFD200'>This hero commands mystical forces to strike foes and support allies with special orbs.</FONT>
